stories.text: It seems that Kubernetes, open source will be the new trend in software development. However, I found that the daily debugging of microservices is inconvenient since we should go through the CI/CD process repeatedly. Is there any reliable ways to debug and test without changing the original services in kubernetes clusters?
stories.title: Ask HN: How can I debug the microservices from my local workstation?
